price: Ahubwo umunsi w’imperuka ni cyo gihe basezeranyijwe (cyo kuzahanirwaho), ndetse imperuka izaba iteye ubwoba cyane kandi irura.
arabic: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوۡعِدُهُمۡ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: bali al-sāʿatu mawʿiduhum wal-sāʿatu adhā wa-amarru
